name: Crystal Clear (Unbreathable)
description:
Crystal Clear

Welcome to Crystal Clear.
In Crystal Clear you, the player, has to protect the Crystal in the center of the map fro m getting infected by the Infection. You also have the newest invention called a Turret right by your side to assist you in defeating the Infection.

Note
Before you start playing the actual game, you might wanna give the Tutorial a try. Options don't exist yet, since I didn't have time for them anymore. (Ludum Dare 50)
